userText: “Always code as if the guy who ends up maintaining your code will be a violent psychopath who knows where you live.” -Martin Golding
“To iterate is human, to recurse divine”. - L. Peter Deutsch
“If you can imagine it you can program it.” - Alejandro Taboada

works.description: Development assistant of the support and technological assistance department using HTML, CSS and Java Script in the Biblioteca Pública de San Miguel de Allende Gto.
works.address: Insurgentes #25, San Miguel de Allende, Zona Centro, 37700

works.description: DBA assistant and development of systems that help the construction make the processes simpler.
works.address: Gran Vivir, Carretera León-Lagos km 8.5 Col, 37669 Lagunillas, Gto.

works.description: Communication 4.0 project of the Volkswagen Challenge 2.0, leading the team from March to November 2023. My responsibility was to facilitate the development process and ensure the efficient implementation of the Scrum methodology. Under my direction, we achieved second place in the competition, and I also took on the role of backend-lead and database developer, demonstrating my ability to lead in multiple areas

5th place nationally in architecture development, application to read dicom files for the analysis of x-ray results for sending via WhatsApp, served as team lead and backend lead for the development of the solution
works.address: Blvd. Campestre 906, Jardines del Moral, 37160 León de los Aldama

works.description: Development of serverless applications through the entire AWS ecosystem focused on data consistency, endpoint creation, front-end integration, application performance monitoring and doing a bit of DevOps
works.address: Blvd. Campestre 906, Jardines del Moral, 37160 León de los Aldama

school.address: Av. Educación Tecnológica No.4 Lomas, Fray Juan de San Miguel, 37713, San Miguel de Allende, GTO.

school.institutionName: Universidad La Salle Bajío Campus Campestre
school.address: Avenida Universidad 602, Lomas del Campestre, 37150 León, Gto.
Av Paseo del Moral 1030-Locales 14D Y C, Villa del Juncal, 37160 León, Gto.

sections.name: Something
sections.content: It is a long established fact that a reader will be distracted by the readable content of a page when looking at its layout. The point of using Lorem Ipsum is that it has a more-or-less normal distribution of letters, as opposed to using 'Content here, content here', making it look like readable English.
